|align=right |   || '''San Marino''' || align=right | 61,19 || align=right | 22.125 || align=right | 25.515 || align=right | 30.368 |} Though it is one of the biggest towns of the Republic, [[Dogana]] is not an autonomous ''castello'' but belongs to the ''castello'' of Serravalle. Like Italian [[comune|''comuni'']], the ''castelli'' of San Marino include a main town that is the seat of the castello, called the ''capoluogo'', and some small settlements known as ''[[frazione|frazioni]]'' or ''curazie''. ==See also== *[[ISO 3166-2:SM]] {{San Marino}} {{List of cities in Europe}} {{Articles on first-level administrative divisions of European countries}} [[Category:Municipalities of San Marino| ]] [[Category:Subdivisions of San Marino|Municipalities]] [[Category:Lists of country subdivisions|San Marino, Municipalities]] [[Category:Country subdivisions of Europe|San Marino 1]] [[Category:First-level administrative country subdivisions|Municipalities, San Marino]] [[Category:Lists of cities by country|San Marino]] [[Category:San Marino-related lists|Cities]] {{SanMarino-geo-stub}}
